name: IDlect Patent
overview:
Nowadays, cost of patent attorney services for patent application filling begins from 5000$. Typically invention description, which was created by inventor is not suitable for patent application filling, so patent attorney need from 3 to 10 hours (500$/hour) to modify invention description. IDlect Patent is a software, which help user to prepare a patent-styled invention description and reduce cost of IP services by up to 30%. With IDlect Patent, inventor can prepare an invention description, which contains all necessary information for patent application filling. So, patent attorney will not need to modify invention and he can start patent application filling right after first consultation.

Features of IDlect Patent

Easy-to-use. Software contains step-by-step guide for creation a patent-styled invention description. User needn’t to know patent law, all he need is to know his invention. Economy. Typically patent attorney create a patent-styled invention description. But, when user come with ready patent-styled invention description, patent attorney will need less hours for patent application drafting. Affordable. Cost of use is only 49,99 USD. If user will choose IDlect Patent Agency for patent drafting services, then he will use IDlect Patent for free.
